titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to William Stewart
CWG13803

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; Folder 1865 Telegraphing, State Guards, Printing, Hospital, Office Expenses, Services Rendered; Right Stack

body.p:
No. 22.
The State of Kentucky,
To William Stewart Dr

row.cell: To Services rendered during the month of February as clerk in the Inspector Generals department @ $8333/100 pr mo

body.p:
Approved & the Quarter Master General is ordered to pay this amount out of militia fund
Thos E Bramlette
Govr.
I Certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were necessary for the public service.

D W Lindsey
Inspr & Adjt Genl. Quarter-Master Ky.

Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, the of February, 1865, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter-Master General of the State of Kentucky, the sum of Eighty three Dollars, and Thirty three Cents, in full of the above account.

No. 22.
The State of Kentucky,
To William Stewart Dr

row.cell: To Services rendered during the month of February as clerk in the Inspector Generals department @ $8333/100 pr mo

body.p: Approved & the Quarter Master General is ordered to pay this amount out of militia fund
I Certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were necessary for the public service.

D W Lindsey
Inspr & Adjt Genl. Quarter-Master Ky.

Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, the of , 186, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter-Master General of the State of Kentucky, the sum of Eighty three Dollars, and Thirty three Cents, in full of the above account.

No. 22.
No. Abstract B Qr. 186
Wm Stewart
Dollars 83 33/100
Paid , 186.
